name: BunnyShroom
description:
The mushrooms have taken over the garden and are attacking you! Use upgrades to upgrade your abiliites but if you get too many you might find your movements going 'out of control'!

Made for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam in 48 hours.

I've been making games in 3d for a while now, but this is the first time I've made one for a game jam. It was a real challenge but I'm really happy with the result. Feedback is appreciated!
